elements.text: yes I was wondering if anyone is using org-mode together with Franklin as the emacs Publish

text: I suspect that Franklin works only with markdown files thus it would not be trivial to use org-mode with it. Perhaps a viable option is to preprocess in converting org to md and then use Franklin. It may even possible to specify a preprocessing function for the inputs.
